scenes.title: What is OnlyFans?
scenes.subtitle: Module 1.1 â€” Foundations
scenes.narration: Welcome to Chatting Wizard School. Let's learn what OnlyFans is.

scenes.heading: A Content Platform
points: Creators share exclusive photos and videos
Fans pay monthly to access the content
Chatters talk to fans and drive sales
scenes.narration: OnlyFans is a content platform. Creators share exclusive photos and videos. Fans pay a monthly subscription to see this content. And chatters, like you, talk to fans and drive the sales.

scenes.title: That's the basics!
scenes.subtitle: Next: Your Role as a Chatter
scenes.narration: Now you know the basics. Next up, your role as a chatter.
